title: Rumer Willis flaunts her cleavage in a classic chic black plunging suit at amfAR Gala in Hollywood
text:
It was a star studded affair at the 10th annual amfAR Gala in Los Angeles on Thursday night.

The event helps raise money for The Foundation For Aids Research, an international non-profit organization dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education and the advocacy of AIDS-related public policy.

Among the many high profile celebrities on hand to lend their support was Rumor Willis, who flaunted her toned figure in a classic-chic plunging suit.

Classic-chic: Rumor Willis, 31, attended the 10th Annual amfAR Gala Los Angeles in Hollywood on Thursday

The actress, 31, looked equal parts classy and edgy by wearing the gorgeous suit without a shirt.

The plunging neckline of the jacket fell to the middle of her stomach, while the matching slacks hugged her derriere but flared out along the legs.

For an added touch of edgy, she wore a thick chain necklace that gave the appearance that it wrapped around her neck several times over.

Lady in black: The actress looked equal parts classy and edgy by wearing the gorgeous plunging suit without a shirt

Added touch: She accessorized with a thick chain necklace, several bracelets, rings and a stylish black hand purse

Charitable support: Willis sat with friend and artist, Devon Bunce at the event

She also accessorized with a number of bracelets, rings and a stylish black hand purse.

The Dancing With The Stars season 20 champion wore her wavy raven tresses long and flowing well past her shoulders and with a part in the middle.

Willis spent much of her time with friend and artist Devon Bunce. She recorded some of the highlights of the night that included Christina Aguilera's headlining performance.

Before heading out, the daughter of actors Demi Moore and Bruce Willis gave her 729,000 Instagram followers a behind-the-scenes look at how her make-up artist got her ready for the gala.

Behind-the-scenes: Willis also shared some clips from the event on her Instagram Story

Working it: The Empire star got playful with her selfie videos

A-lister: Willis also shared some of Christina Aguilera's performance at the gala

Gwyneth Paltrow and art dealer Larry Gagosian were honored at the event with the Award Of Courage for their work in the fight against HIV and AIDS, as well as their other humanitarian efforts.

Since it began, the amfAR Gala Los Angeles has raised more than $14 million for the organization's HIV/AIDS research programs.

Overall, amfAR has provided over 3,300 grants to research teams across the world and has invested over $400 million to research aiming to effectively treat HIV and AIDS related illness

Some of the other celebrities to attended this year's gala included Katy Perry, Paris Jackson, James Corden, Tom Ford, Heidi Klum, Lea Michele, Chantel Jeffries, Eva Longoria, Alexandra Daddario, EJ Johnson and Viktor Luna.
